content: Hello All, What would be the best way to understand & learn FHIR? Can anyone please guide me? I know FHIR Basics and but need to learn more for implementing integration bi-directional using FHIR.
Hi Ankur, perhaps this can help you get started implementing FHIR API communication in .NET (C#) or Java: https://fhir-drills.github.io/fhir-api.html
